en:
Throughout the month of October, find in your shops many initiatives in favour of the Fight against breast cancer
In your ready-to-wear shops

The CC43, Cr√©ateurs Club d'Ici et de Russie, in partnership with the designer Adeline Monniez Marbella, is offering "Pink Ribbon" skin jewellery for sale throughout the month of October.
The sale price is 12 euros and 50% of the amount will be donated to the Association THINK PINK.
And every evening, the shop will be illuminated in pink.
43 rue Saint Louis
*See conditions in the shop

The Harcour shop offers a pair of pink lurex socks for any purchase of a minimum of 79.98‚Ç¨, and at the end of October, for any purchase of a Livia mug, 5‚Ç¨ will be donated to the Pink Ribbon association
35 rue Saint Jean
*See conditions in store

The Caroll le touquet boutique will donate part of its sales to the purchase of a scarf
64 rue St jean

The Ycoz shop offers a 10% discount for the purchase of a pink article in the shop
3 Avenue du Verger

Les Touquetoises jewellery store is involved throughout the month of October through a whole series of actions in support of the N√©nuphar association
The first action is based on the creation of jewels created with the effigy of the Association Maison N√©nuphar, the totality of the profits of which will be transferred directly to this one.
Find these jewels in pre-order on our site www.lestouquetoises.fr and in shop.
3 rue Saint Jean



In your bars and restaurants
Algy's Bar, will donate during the month of October the totality of the sales of the pink flamingo cocktail to an association for the fight against cancer
20 Avenue Saint jean

In your food shops
Boulangerie Fred, will be making eclairs and raspberry religieuses throughout October, and will be donating part of its sales to the Duch√™ne Hospital in Boulogne/mer.
111 rue de Metz
*See conditions in shop

The Jean Trogneux chocolate factory will be making bust-shaped chocolate bites for the occasion, and will donate 100% of sales to the fight against cancer.
38 rue Saint Jean
*See conditions in shop

The press house of Le Touquet, will illuminate its window with pink during the whole month

The Axe Sport gym
In this month of fight against breast cancer, and awareness for screening, AXE Sport Health organizes 2 classes DRESS CODE PINK
üë† salsa Friday 8 October at 18H30 with Elodie
ü•ä boxing on Thursday 14th October at 7.30pm with Aur√©lien
üëüAXE Sport Sant√© supports the beautiful event of the Corrida Rose du Touquet on Sunday 24 October: hydrojet massages will be offered.
295 Ave Georges Besse
*See conditions with the managers

We would also like to thank all the shops that will have supported this cause in the windows by bringing a touch of pink.
